entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (padawan_sob_story_01.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_182378be: Please, I could care less about that waste of space.  I just want the blaster he took back.    The blaster belonged to my father and he had no right to take it with him, the thing was an antique and didn't even work.  To tell you the truth, I would be more surprised if my brother was still alive.
entries.s_1cf278e9: I will help you find your brother.
entries.s_1f8a26f8: This means quite a lot to me. Thank you.
entries.s_202dc610: More the fool am I. I should have stopped him. Or something. Now he's gone and he took it with him. Yes, quite the fool.
entries.s_2438dea0: I've decided you're a lunatic, lady, and probably don't even have a brother.
entries.s_290ad18b: No, I'm afraid I've had enough of you as well.  Good bye.
entries.s_291d0c7a: Well, if that's the case, what are you talking about?
entries.s_297f30e9: I'm here, and yes, willing to help you.
entries.s_2e220ef9: You are not the only one.
entries.s_31: Good. My brother and his friends were talking all last week about going camping somewhere in the wild.  My brother, or his corpse, should be somewhere in the area where they were camping. The blaster should be with him. Get it and bring it back to me.
entries.s_360d601b: That could be arranged.  Forget I asked.
entries.s_390df542: Um.. yeah.  That is exactly why I'm here.
entries.s_3d146002: Do you have the blaster? Were you able to find it?
entries.s_40: Good. My brother and his friends were talking all last week about going camping somewhere in the wild.  My brother, or his corpse, should be somewhere in the area where they were camping. The blaster should be with him. Get it and bring it back to me.
entries.s_45240d04: Why are you back without the blaster?
entries.s_4c1008a4: Oh good, you are already here.
entries.s_4f7b1e26: That's not what I'm worried about.  He took my father's blaster with him.  I want that thing back.
entries.s_51: Please, I could care less about that waste of space.  I just want the blaster he took back.    The blaster belonged to my father and he had no right to take it with him, the thing was an antique and didn't even work.  To tell you the truth, I would be more surprised if my brother was still alive.
entries.s_55: My brother and his friends were talking all last week about going camping somewhere in the wild.  My brother, or his corpse, should be somewhere in the area where they were camping. The blaster should be with him. Get it and bring it back to me.
entries.s_59: Believe me, I would if I could.  Sadly I have other obligations, like standing here sending smart mouthed adventurers out to their most certain doom.  You going to help?  Or just continue to grace me with your, oh so precious presence... and stench.
entries.s_5bd31ce: I see. Then go. And thanks for nothing.
entries.s_61: Your charm has won me over, how can I help?
entries.s_63: Good. My brother and his friends were talking all last week about going camping somewhere in the wild.  My brother, or his corpse, should be somewhere in the area where they were camping. The blaster should be with him. Get it and bring it back to me.
entries.s_65: No, I'm afraid I've had enough of you as well.  Good bye.
entries.s_6845d2f7: Yeah, I have some time to spare.
entries.s_69: Sounds like he's dead.  Sorry to break the news to you.
entries.s_6f0025f1: So are you, or are you not, here to help me.
entries.s_71: That's not what I'm worried about.  He took my father's blaster with him.  I want that thing back.
entries.s_72071926: Good, because I could care less about that wasted soul.  I just want the blaster he stole from me back.    You willing to help?
entries.s_83d29997: Lies don't score you any points.
entries.s_8de1965a: That's a shame, but I'm off.  I have things to do that I actually care about.
entries.s_91b4a77f: Good. Good. I... thank you. This is hitting me harder than I thought it would. Please excuse me.
entries.s_94c910a4: I would rather kiss a Gamorrean.
entries.s_986473: My brother went out with a group of his friends last week, and has yet to return.  Neither have any of his friends.
entries.s_9a6c3b2a: Sounds like he's dead.  Sorry to break the news to you.
entries.s_a128b86a: Your charm has won me over, how can I help?

entries.s_d3249f0b: I'm here, but why would I want to help you. Jump off.
entries.s_da7087d0: Yes, I found his remains and the blaster in the area you expected.
entries.s_dbff867f: You are here to help find my brother right?
entries.s_e2b8c011: Just hurry up and get me that blaster before someone else makes off with it.
entries.s_e6ae286a: I'm working on it. Not quite finished yet.
entries.s_ed0b42f4: I figured as much, well, you are smarter than you look.  See you around.
